snippet.textDisplay:
DONT donate to Australia! Here is why...
It IS heartbreaking to watch the devasting news from Australia these days. BUT giving donations to Australia is wrong. Australian politicians, that are elected by the Australian people, have been ignoring the climate scientists for decades and have supported and promoted the Australian fossile fuel industry, specifically the coal industry heavily. The coal industry, the politicians and tv stations like Sky news Australia have been lying for decades to the Australian people. Its a bit like the South Africa boycott many years ago. Only a financial boycot spoke the language needed for change.
Donating to people hit by climate change extremes are a good thing if it are for people that have educated themselves, have acted on the knowledge and are changing thier ways. Donate to island nations that havent done anything wrong, like Vanuatu. They are going to loose their nation if countries like Australia, USA, China, Russia, Brasil dont act differently.
Australia had 511 424 730 acres of agricultural land in 1968. Since then climate change has, bit by bit, made large areas impossible to grow anything on, WHILE the coal production in same period has gone up up up. Today Australia has only 371 837 000 acres of agricultural land. The coal lobby have more concentrated wealth and has been far better organised than the farmers.....They bribe, sorry lobby, better and they ensure well paid, do nothing jobs, for all the leading politicians that have been promoting the expansion of the coal industry against the knowledge they posses.
SO PLEASE DONT donate to Australia. IF they change their destructive polititics and later get hit again, then you can donate, but the only way to get Australia to change their ways are the realisation that it costs more to treat the symptoms, like fires, than to cure the patient, namely closing the coal industry down and change into solar and wind power.
Australia has SO much land and SO high temperatures and many solar hours. They are in a perfect position to a fast transition into going green electric and even maybe make hydrogen for exports to the new needed machine types that will need it.
SUPPORT the innocent hit by climate change, DO NOT support the worst emitters. THEY need to change. Dont give money to the evil doers, give it to their casualties. Climate refugees from island nations that have to relocate should be the first to get any donations, not the emitters...they have to learn the lesson and change first.
Be part of the solution, not the problem. There are NO planet B, if we screw this up we are doomed.

snippet.textDisplay: Kangaroo Island in South Australia has the only Koala colony free of chlamydia ,  The Ligurian bees on Kangaroo Island are believed to be the last remaining pure stock of this bee found anywhere in the world.- at least half the Island has been burnt along with large numbers of animals and it's still going. We are technically only just getting to the half way point of our summer - the worst month is still to come going by the past, our summers and the risk of fires run well into March/early April the last few years. I live in the Adelaide hills/southern Barossa Valley in South Australia and so far we have escaped unlike our neighbours in Cudlee Creek, Lobethal, Woodside. Half my house has been emptied and sent to family members in the city for safe keeping, we have had a couple of scary days until the winds changed direction. Why do we live here you may ask.... it's a beautiful place to live, and at the end of the day some of the houses that have been lost around my country had all the best fire protection available, residents stayed to defend with the best equipment but when fires like these attack nothing can stop them and they will take what they want. :(

snippet.textDisplay: As an Australian, I am amazed how you made this funny in order to spread awareness, without being offensive (except to ScoMo which we certainly don't mind). Thanks Trevor!
snippet.textOriginal: As an Australian, I am amazed how you made this funny in order to spread awareness, without being offensive (except to ScoMo which we certainly don't mind). Thanks Trevor!

snippet.textDisplay: Part of the reason that truck driver was so angry was that, apart from saying that volunteer firefighters shouldn't get any compensation for time/risk/etc.... the Prime Minister (ScoMo) also said that they don't need compensation because they "want to be there"...well who wouldn't want to leave their own house at risk to go and fight 60m high walls of flame with a garden hose. Add to that his office lying about him not being out of the country when he was in Hawaii; then claiming he couldn't cut his holiday short because there were no flights back to Aus;...then once back, utterly denying the climate is changing at all...so its "just a normal fire season"; trying to deflect blame to the states; and on and on... finishing up with snippets from his disastrous visits to fire affected people being turned into a party political ad. #MakeItStop

snippet.textDisplay: I really feel for you, Australians. We've had a sample of our own fires in BC Canada but yours seem even worse. I believe this is what global warming looks like. We need to vote for alternative energy supporters. So called leaders like Morrison, Boris and Trump have no place in our changing world.
